operations.description: Reconcile cells in column record - organizationname to type http://schema.org/Organization
Reconcile cells in column record - venuename to type http://schema.org/Place
Create column organization-artsdata-id at index 3 based on column record - organizationname using expression cell.recon.match.id
Create column place-artsdata-id at index 30 based on column record - venuename using expression cell.recon.match.id
